Rokenn

From: <kim@...>

>
> Personally I have gone the hard core Armor Class route. So my current

> -------------------------------------------------
> Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server

So says the man who gave up several high-AC armor pieces to go
for the all-black look. :)

--
John H. Kim
